segments.text: Julia , Julia , Julia . My daring Julia , what's wrong with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Steven , are you talking to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have called you three times . What makes you in a daze ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking about the accident I saw in the morning . I was petrified when two cars collided . I witnessed the traffic accident .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A driver died instantly . The other one was badly hurt . A poor boy called Peter was killed in the accident too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a terrible accident ! Who should be responsible for this traffic accident ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think both . They drove too fast . What's worse , one of them was drunk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do some guys like to drive so fast when they are drunk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don â€™ t understand . Maybe they feel they are okay and driving fast seems very cool .
segments.speaker: S2
